definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Meg graduated from Taiwan's Ming-Chuan College with a BA degree in Tourism Management.
sentences.chinese: 吴湘玲毕业于台湾铭传大学，获旅游管理学士学位。

sentences.english: In 1989 he graduated from the Xian Academy of Fine Arts with a degree in oil painting.
sentences.chinese: 1989年毕业于西安美院油画系，获得学士学位。

sentences.english: I held the B. A. degree in English from Zhejiang Univerisity.
sentences.chinese: 我取得了浙江大学的英语学士学位。

sentences.english: International students with bachelor degrees are eligible to apply for master programs at NPIC.
sentences.chinese: 外国学生具学士学位者，得申请入学本校硕士班。

sentences.english: I held the B.A. degree in English from Zhejiang Univerisity.
sentences.chinese: 我取得了浙江大学的英语学士学位。

sentences.english: She currently pursues her first year bachelor music degree in Haute Ecole de Musique de Genève.
sentences.chinese: 她现就读于日内瓦国立高等音乐学院，攻读学士学位。

sentences.english: If you want to apply for that position a B. E is required.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想申请那个职位得具备工程学专业的学士学位。

sentences.english: I attended high school and college at the University of the Philippines and I graduated with a degree in Accountancy.
sentences.chinese: 我在菲律宾就读高中及大学，并且得到会计学士学位。

sentences.english: I have B.S. in music education.
sentences.chinese: 我有音乐教育的学士学位。

sentences.english: 1979-1983, Bachelor of Science, Hunan Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 1983年，湖南师范大学，理学学士学位。

sentences.english: Mr. Mark Bridgeman obtained his B. A. in Business Studies in University of Glamorgan.
sentences.chinese: 马克布吉曼先生在格拉摩根大学获得商务学学士学位。

sentences.english: Graduated from University of Northampton UK with Education studies and Psychology joint honors.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于英国北安普敦大学，教育学心理学双学士学位。

sentences.english: I have been studying a Bachelor's degree in Education.
sentences.chinese: 我正在修读一个教育学士学位。

sentences.english: I've just finished my Bachelor's here and I plan to go to Australia next summer.
sentences.chinese: 我刚修完了我的学士学位，打算明年夏天去澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Dr. Fuxin Li received his B. E. in Computer Science and Engineering from Zhejiang University in 2001.
sentences.chinese: 李伏欣博士2001年在浙江大学获得学士学位。

sentences.english: Students who pass receive a special international Baccalaureate certificate.
sentences.chinese: 通过考试的学生将获得国际学士学位。

master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
